title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
he will release Wyll within six months.

To the Hells with your conditions. Sever Wyll's pact now, or I'll sever your head. A full half of a year? You've got to be kidding. Shrug. Six months isn't that long a wait. That warlock of yours is turning out to be more trouble than he's worth.

You can choose option 1, but she will not fight you and she will leave.

Note: If Wyll is in your party, she will reward him with an Infernal Rapier for his troubles if you manage to convince her.

Wait for Mizo
